result.name: british-virgin-islands-multibeam-backscatter-data
result.notes:
A multibeam echosounder survey was undertaken in July/August 2014 as part of 
the Darwin Plus funded project (DPLUS026) in the British Virgin Islands. The 
survey was undertaken from the MV Rhone Ranger, owned by the National Parks 
Trust of the Virgin Islands. The survey suite consisted of the following 
items: Teledyne-Reson T20-P multibeam echosounder, Applanix POS MV Wavemaster 
Inertial Motion Unit with Fugro GPS corrections, SAIV SD-204 CTD profiler, 
PDS2000 and Pos-Pac data acquisition software.

This dataset is a raster file in *.img format which shows an image and 
contains backscatter intensity values (in decibels) across the survey area.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
